content.rendered:
Directed by P.S. Mithran.

Written by P.S. Mithran. Pon Parthiban. Rishabh Purohit.

Cast Vishal(Major R. Kathiravan). Samantha Ruth Prabhu(Dr. Rathi Devi). Arjun Sarja(Sathyamoorthy). Delhi Ganesh(Rangaswamy). Robo Shankar(Kathir’s Uncle). Suman(ACP). Vincent Ashokan(Minister). Kaali Venkat(Gnanavel Raja). Darshana Rajendran(Kathir’s Sister). Madhusudhan Rao(Police Officer).G. Marimuthu.Harish.Mahanadhi Shankar. Sharath Ravi(Mobile Shop Owner). Jeremy Roske(Hacker).Vivek Prasanna.Rail Ravi.Kavithalaya Krishnan. R.S. Shivaji(Bank Manager). Sreeja Ravi(Kathir’s Mother) .Gopi Gpr. Ayup Khan(Guest Appearance). Abdool Lee(Hari Krishnnan (bank loan dealer) (as Abdool)). Manikuttan(Kathir’s Colleague). P.S. Mithran(Xerox Shop Owner). Aranthangi Nisha(Rathi’s patient (as Arandhangi Nisha)). Nithin Prasanna((as Nithin Pillay)). Vignesh Raghavan(Unnamed Parkour based role). Rishikanth(Kesavan). Sidharth Varma(Hacker). Pradeep K Vijayan(Sivakumar)

Language Tamil.

Producer Vishal.

Production Goldmines Telefilms. Vishal Film Factors.
